chat.title: Chat
chat.access-code-tooltip: Enter the access code to use the application
chat.openai-host-tooltip: Host address for connecting to the OpenAI API
chat.system-role-tooltip: The role of the system in the chat
chat.default-prompt-tooltip: This will be used as the first prompt when the chat is reset
chat.use-assistant-tooltip: This will improve the accuracy of replies, but will use more Tokens
chat.temperature-tooltip: The higher the temperature, the more diverse the response, but it may be less relevant
chat.maximum-messages-tooltip: This will improve the accuracy of replies, but will use more Tokens
chat.already-set-environment-variable: OpenAI API key has been set in the environment variable

synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.synthesis-service-tooltip: The service used to synthesize speech
synthesis.engine-tooltip: Neural engine is more expensive but more natural sounding
synthesis.voice-id-tooltip: The voice used to synthesize speech
synthesis.polly-standard-not-supported: The selected language is not supported by Amazon Polly Standard TTS
synthesis.polly-neural-not-supported: The selected language is not supported by Amazon Polly Neural TTS
synthesis.mobile-not-supported: Currently, mobile devices are not supported for builtin speech synthesis
synthesis.azure-already-set-environment-variable: Azure access key has been set in the environment variable
synthesis.polly-already-set-environment-variable: AWS access key has been set in the environment variable

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.browser-not-supported: Currently, only Chrome is supported for builtin voice recognition
recognition.mobile-not-supported: Currently, mobile devices are not supported for builtin voice recognition
recognition.recognition-service-tooltip: The service used to recognize speech
recognition.continuous-tooltip: Whether to keep recognizing speech after system response
recognition.start-time-tooltip: The time when the recognition starts after system response
recognition.azure-already-set-environment-variable: Azure access key has been set in the environment variable

about.title: About
about.about-text:
SpeechGPT is a web application that enables you to converse with ChatGPT.
You can utilize this app to improve your language speaking skills or simply have fun chatting with ChatGPT.

tips.tips1: Please provide the <u>OpenAI API Key</u> before usage.
tips.tips2: In order to utilize <u>Azure Speech Services</u> or <u>Amazon Polly</u>, you will need to provide the corresponding access key.

notification.openai-error: There was an error with your request
notification.empty-openai-key: You don't have provided an OpenAI API Key
notification.azure-error: There was an error with Azure speech services
notification.empty-azure-key: You don't have provided an Azure Access Key
notification.azure-synthesis-error: There was an error with Azure speech synthesis
notification.azure-recognition-error: There was an error with Azure speech recognition
notification.polly-synthesis-error: There was an error with Amazon Polly speech synthesis
